[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/heft](./heft.md) &gt; [ISharedTypeScriptConfiguration](./heft.isharedtypescriptconfiguration.md) &gt; [maxWriteParallelism](./heft.isharedtypescriptconfiguration.maxwriteparallelism.md)

## ISharedTypeScriptConfiguration.maxWriteParallelism property

Set this to change the maximum write parallelism. The default is 50.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
maxWriteParallelism: number;
```
